meanings.sent1: The puppy was very handsome with its shiny fur.
meanings.sent2: She thought the sunset was so handsome that she took a picture.
meanings.sent3: The handsome cake was almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked handsome with its colorful flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The handsome prince captured everyone's attention with his regal presence.

meanings.definition: Generous or substantial in size or amount
